pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualization of Clonal Expansion for Single Cell Immune Profiles // Visualize clonal expansion via circle-packing. 'APackOfTheClones' extends 'scRepertoire' to produce a publication-ready visualization of clonal expansion at a single cell resolution, by representing expanded clones as differently sized circles. The method was originally implemented by Murray Christian and Ben Murrell in the following immunology study: Ma et al. (2021) doi:10.1126/sciimmunol.abg6356.
